column1: fp2_struggle.0501.desc0:"The Iberian peninsula is in turmoil
column2: a conflict born of its storied past. Outsiders covet the land and the great Muslim and Christian powers seek to sway its people. But those who live and die on its soil will ultimately determine its fate.\n\n"

column1: fp2_struggle.0501.desc.involved0:"I will not let slip my vision for my homeland. By [ROOT.Char.GetFaith.HighGodName]
column2: House [ROOT.Char.GetHouse.GetNameNoTooltip] will weather the storm and see my will fulfilled.\n\n"

column1: fp2_struggle.0501.desc.interloper0:"The time has come for me to take hold of the situation and my destiny. I see all the pieces laid out on the board. I know the way forward
column2: and there will be no stopping House [ROOT.Char.GetHouse.GetNameNoTooltip].\n\n"

column1: fp2_struggle.0900.opening.basque0:"We [ROOT.Char.GetCulture.GetNameNoTooltip] have endured centuries of encroachment: Visigoths
column5: each of their strengths faltered. Today
column6: the fate of Iberia is in #EMP our#! hands once more."

column1: fp2_struggle.0900.opening.andalusian0:"The history of our people is as complex as we are diverse
column2: and as fraught as we are strong. The future of Iberia will once again be decided by the heirs of the Umayyads."

column1: fp2_struggle.0900.opening.iberian0:"For too long the Iberian peoples have suffered at the hands of the Moorish invaders; today we will restore the hope that the rightful heirs of Rome lost centuries ago."
fp2_struggle.0900.opening0:"The chaos that Iberia suffered in the preceding centuries has left a stain in the hearts of all its inhabitants. Today begins this peninsula's next chapter..."
fp2_struggle.0900.desc0:"\n\nThere is now no other realm that can truly contest [ROOT.Char.GetPrimaryTitle.GetAdjectiveNoTooltip] dominance in Iberia
column2: or the priests and settlers who bring the word of [ROOT.Char.GetFaith.HighGodName] and [ROOT.Char.GetCulture.GetName] civilization to its villages.\n\nAll that remains is to declare this victory
column3: having decided how to proceed with our rule."

column1: fp2_struggle.0900.a0:"This shall be a land of [ROOT.Char.GetFaith.HighGodNameAlternate]!"
fp2_struggle.0900.b0:"The settlement of this peninsula will be our focus."

column2: deliverance from the uncertainty that has engulfed the region for centuries may now be at hand..."

column1: fp2_struggle.0910.opening0:"Word of recent developments on the Iberian peninsula has reached our court
column2: promising an end to the conflicts that have plagued the region."
who now controls the majority of the peninsula
column3: has proclaimed [struggle_ender.GetHerselfHimself] the ultimate victor of the struggles set in motion long ago by the Moorish invasion.\n\n"

column1: fp2_struggle.0910.closing.faith0:"[struggle_ender.GetSheHe|U] has proclaimed Iberia to be a [struggle_ender.GetFaith.GetAdjective] land
column4: all heretics and infidels will be driven from [struggle_ender.GetHerHis] domain."

column1: fp2_struggle.0910.closing.culture0:"[struggle_ender.GetSheHe|U] has proclaimed Iberia belongs to the [struggle_ender.GetCulture.GetName]
column2: and that all foreign invaders and subjugated peoples accept this reality."

column1: fp2_struggle.0910.closing.combined0:"[struggle_ender.GetSheHe|U] has proclaimed Iberia and [struggle_ender.GetPrimaryTitle.GetNameNoTier] to be one and the same
column2: now delivered to the hands of the [struggle_ender.GetFaith.GetAdjective] [struggle_ender.GetCulture.GetName] by [struggle_ender.GetFaith.HighGodName]..."

column1:
fp2_struggle.0901.desc0:"

It is now clear there will be no end to this cycle of bloodshed if things continue; this peninsula will not bear unification.

We must be satisfied with [ROOT.Char.GetPrimaryTitle.GetNameNoTierNoTooltip]
column2: and leave the other potentates of Iberia to their own devices - for now..."

column1: fp2_struggle.0911.desc0:"\n\n[struggle_ender.GetTitledFirstName] has officialy renounced any intentions to unite the peninsula under a common crown
column2: and declared any who would that title illegitimate.\n\nThe disparate realms molded by centuries of invasion and reconquest are now too entrenched to be united."

column1: fp2_struggle.0911.a0:"We will not forget the dream of Hispania..."

column2: which only I am now in a position to enforce
column3: will ensure the diverse peoples of the region may live and worship freely.\n\n[ROOT.Char.GetFaith.HighGodName] willing
column4: the wars of the past will remain there
column5: and the other Iberian princes will see the benefits of co-existence."

column1: fp2_struggle.0912.desc0:"\n\n[struggle_ender.GetPrimaryTitle.GetAdjectiveNoTooltip] heralds have proclaimed guarantees of free passage and worship for all
column3: to the wide acclamation of the common people.\n\nMany have longed for an end to the bloodshed in Iberia; perhaps #EMP this#! peace will be a lasting one."
